r.d: An interface for accessing Digg's web services API at http://services.digg.com.
r.n: * Pass along X-Forwarded-For HTTP header in Services_Digg_Proxy * Pass along the HTTP referer in Services_Digg_Proxy * Pass all HTTP headers received from the API back to the client * Allow JSON, XML and JavaScript types to be used via Services_Digg_Proxy
